short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes inactive tabs after a specified time period

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-Close Old Tabs

Automatically manage your browser tabs and reduce memory usage by closing inactive tabs after a customizable time period.

Key Features:
• Automatically closes inactive tabs after your chosen time period (1 hour to 1 week)
• Track and restore recently closed tabs with a single click
• See which tabs were closed automatically vs. manually
• Simple toggle to enable/disable auto-closing
• Clean, intuitive interface
• Minimize browser memory usage
• Keep your workflow organized

How It Works:
Set your preferred inactivity timeout, and the extension will monitor your open tabs. Tabs that haven't been active for the specified duration will be automatically closed. Don't worry about losing important tabs - the extension keeps track of recently closed tabs, allowing you to quickly restore any that you still need.

Perfect for:
• Users who frequently work with many open tabs
• Anyone looking to reduce browser memory usage
• People who want to maintain an organized browsing experience
• Those who occasionally lose track of their open tabs

All tab management happens locally on your device - no data is sent to external servers.

Free up your browser's resources and keep your workflow organized with Auto-Close Old Tabs!
